metadata.title: Tick-borne encephalitis virus inhibits rRNA synthesis and host protein production in human cells of neural origin

abstract.original_text: OPEN ACCESS Citation: Selinger M, Tykalová H, Štěrba J, Věchtová P, Vavrušková Z, Lieskovská J, et al. (2019) Tick-borne encephalitis virus inhibits rRNA synthesis and host protein production in human cells of neural origin. PLoS Negl Trop Dis 13(9): e0007745. https://doi.org/10.
